divy38:2: mātaryapakāriṇaḥ prāṇina ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino bhavantīti satatasamupajāyamānapremaprasādabahumānamānasaiḥ satpuruṣairmātaraḥ śuśrūṣaṇīyāḥ |
divy38:8: dṛṣṭvā lokamimaṁ dhanakṣayabhayāt saṁtyaktadānotsavaṁ lokakleśapiśācikāvaśatayā saṁdūṣitādhyāśayam |
divy38:9: kāruṇyāt sa dadāvanāthakṛpaṇaklībāturebhyo dhanaṁ matvā ca prahatārṇavormicapalaṁ svaṁ jīvitaṁ bhūyasā (3)|
divy38:10: yeṣu vyāsajjacetā bhujagavaravadhūbhogabhīmeṣu labdhā gāhante pāpagartaṁ sphuṭadahanaśikhābhīmaparyantarandhram |
divy38:12: tasmāt putradhanatvāt putrābhilāṣiṇo yadā manorathaśatairasakṛdunmiṣitonmiṣitāḥ putraśriyaḥ prasahya sphītataravairabhārendhanavahninaiva vigatanikhilapratīkāradāruṇaprabhāvamahatā sukṛtāntalayaīkaparāyaṇāḥ kriyante sma, yadāsau lokapravādamātrayāpi panthānaṁ samavatīrya dhanadavaruṇakuberaśaṁkarajanārdanapitāmahādīn devatāviśeṣān putrārtham yācitumārebhe |
divy38:14: tattattasya prabalavirasam yāti tīkṣṇāṁśumālaiḥ śoṣaṁ manye raviriva jalaṁ bhāgadheyārkabimbam (5)| rudraṁ naikakapālaśekharadharaṁ cakrāyudhaṁ vajriṇaṁ sraṣṭāraṁ makaradhvajaṁ girisutāputraṁ mayūrāsanam |
divy38:15: gaṅgāśaṅkhadalāvadātasalilāṁstāṁstāṁśca devānasau putrārthī śaraṇam yayau bahu punardānaṁ dvijebhyo dadau (6)|
divy38:18: evamanekaprakārakāyacetasorāyāsakāribhirapi vratopavāsamaṅgalairyadā naiva kadācit kāle ’sya putrā jīvino babhūvuḥ, tadainamativipule pragāḍhaśokāpagāmbhasi nimajjantaṁ kaścit sādhupuruṣo ’bravīt— karmāṇyevāvalambanti dehināṁ sarvasampadaḥ |
divy38:21: na ca te ’dyāpi jīvanti tatra kiṁ parikhidyase (9)|
divy38:23: ye yairvinā nātmabhavaṁ labhante te tairvinā janma kathaṁ bhajeran (10)|
divy38:25: tvaṁ kenāpi viḍambase jaḍamatiḥ putrāśayonmattako yastvaṁ dyāmadhigantumicchasi bṛhatsopānamālāśrayāt (12)|
divy38:26: vidhimaparamahaṁ te bodhayāmi prasiddhyai tvamapi ca kuru tāvat saṁprasiddhyai kadācit |
divy38:27: yadi bhavati sutaste kanyakānāma tasya sakalajanapade ’smin khyāpayasva prasiddhyā (13)|
divy38:28: atha tasya kālāntare gaganatalamaṁśumālīva svakiraṇanikarairvirājamānaṁ svavaṁśalakṣmīḥ putraṁ janayāmbabhūva |
divy38:32: mūrtistasya rarāja cāruśikharāddhemam yathā bhūcyutaṁ prodgīrṇasvamayūkhajālajaṭilai ratnāṅkurairveṣṭitam (15)|
divy38:39: atha tasya pitā mitraḥ sārthavāho vaṇigjanaiḥ |
divy38:42: pitaryatīte jananīṁ jagāda cakāra kiṁ karma pitā mameti (20)|
divy38:48: yāvaccāyaṁ janapadamimaṁ tasya vṛttiṁ na bhūtāṁ pṛcchatyasmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ |
divy38:49: tāvadyuktaṁ mama sutamimaṁ mṛtyuvaktrāntarālaṁ nānāduḥkhavyasanagahanaṁ vyādhiṣaktaṁ niṣeddhum (23)|
divy38:50: paro ’pi yaḥ sādhujanānujuṣṭaṁ vihāya mārgaṁ śrayate vimārgam |
divy38:51: nivāraṇīyaḥ sa svamatājjanena prayatnataḥ kiṁ punareva putraḥ (24)|
divy38:52: tato jananī kathayāṁcakre— putra aukarikatvena pitā te māmapūpuṣat |
divy38:54: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo māturvacanaṁ kusumamālāmiva śirasā samabhivandya anyasminnahani aukarikāpaṇaṁ prasasāra |
divy38:57: svagarbhasaṁdhāraṇaduḥkhitāyai dadau sa tasyai mudito jananyai |
divy38:59: atha ye tasmin puravare ciraṁtanā aukarikāḥ, te tasya tāmabhivardhamānāṁ kriyavikrayalokamaviṣamavyavahāranītyā prakṛtipremapeśalatayā cāvarjitamanasastasmin mahāsattve vyavahārārthamāpatantamavalokya taṁ tasmātkarmaṇo vinivartanārthamāhuh— gāndhikāpaṇikaḥ śreṣṭhī pitaitasmin pure purā |
divy38:60: sa tvaṁ tāṁ vṛttimujjhatvā śrayase ’nyāṁ kayā dhiyā (28)|
divy38:61: atha bodhisattvastāmāpi jīvikāmapahāya gāndhikāpaṇaṁ cakāra— yasminneva dine cakre sa sādhurgāndhikāpaṇam |
divy38:64: atha gāndhikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṁ mahāsattvaṁ vicchandayāmāsuh— gāndhāpaṇaṁ klībajanābhipannaṁ pitā na vai mādya pure(?) cakāra |
divy38:65: tatraiva hairaṇyikatāṁ sa kṛtvā dhanāni bhūyāṁsi samāpa sādho (30)|
divy38:66: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāmapi jīvikāmapahāya hairaṇyikāpaṇaṁ cakrāra |
divy38:68: lebhe dine sa prathame mahārhaḥ kārṣāpaṇān ṣoḍaśa tān dadau ca (31)|
divy38:71: atha hairaṇyikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣā sametyāgatya ca taṁ tasmātkarmaṇo vinivartanārthamāhuh— śaraccandrāṁśudhavale labdhvā janma kule katham |
divy38:74: vivartitaṁ ślāghyamatīva puṁsāṁ na tu svavṛtteścyavanaṁ pravṛttam (34)|
divy38:77: yadāśritaṁ karma janānuvarjinā tvayā vidagdhena dhanepsunādhunā |
divy38:78: kathaṁ na saṁprāpsyasi bhāgyasampadaṁ piturvyatīte ’pi viśālinīṁ śriyam (36)|
divy38:80: tasyā mahendrāmalatulyakīrteḥ sūnuḥ kathaṁ tvaṁ na bibharṣi lajjām (37)|
divy38:81: ye mṛtyuṁ gaṇayanti naiva vipadi grāsaṁ bhajante ’nagha gehe bandhuṣu sūnuṣu vyapagatasnehātmanodyoginaḥ |
divy38:82: ye nītvā jaladhīnagādhasalilānāvartabhīmān budhāḥ prāpyārthān gajadantabhaṅgasitayāsinvanta kīrtyā jagat (38)|
divy38:83: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastebhyo ’pi tathānuguṇinīṁ kathāmavadhārya samudrāvataraṇakṛtavyavasāyo mātaramupasṛtyovāca—amba, sārthavāhaḥ kilāsmākaṁ pitā purā |
divy38:85: sā pūrvameva bhartṛmaraṇaduḥkhena vigatajīvitāśā svasya tanayasya tenāsamlakṣitadāruṇena viyogaśokaśastreṇa bhṛśataraṁ pravidāryamāṇahṛdayeva svatanayamāha— vatsa kena tavākhyātaṁ vinākāraṇaśatrunā |
divy38:86: jīvitaṁ kasya te ’niṣṭaṁ tvayā krīḍāṁ karoti kaḥ (39)|
divy38:89: na yāvadevaṁ mama duḥkhaśalyaṁ prayāti nāśaṁ pravidārya śokam |
divy38:90: kathaṁ nu tasyopari me dvitīyaṁ nipātyate pāpamayairamitraiḥ (41)|
divy38:91: yeṣāṁ ceto vividhavirasāyāsaduḥkhāprakampyam yaiḥ saṁtyaktaṁ kṛpaṇahṛdayairjīvitaṁ bhogalubdhaiḥ |
divy38:92: te saṁtyaktvā nayanagalitāśrupravāhārdravaktrān bandhūnajñā makaranilaye mṛtyave yānti nāśam (42)|
divy38:94: saṁtyajya yātuṁ kathamudyamaste mā sā kathā mā nu vaco madīyam(?) (43)|
divy38:96: saṁpattayo yena vaṇigjanasya tato ’hamevaṁ suta vārayāmi (44)|
divy38:97: sa tasyā hitārthaṁ madhurāṇyapi vacanakusumāni tṛṇamivāvadhūya sapragalbhatayā samavalambitavikatthāśobhaṁ kiṁcidīdṛśaṁ pratyāha— varaṁ naiva tu jāyeran ye jātā nirdhanā janāḥ |
divy38:98: jātasya yadi duḥkhāni varaṁ mṛtyur na jīvitam (45)|
divy38:100: arthino mama pāpasya yānti niḥśvasya durmanāḥ (46)|
divy38:101: ye śaktihīnā vibhavārjanādau te dehino duḥkhaśataṁ sahante |
divy38:102: lokaṁ punarduḥkhaśatopataptaṁ draṣṭaṁ na śaknomi cirāyamāṇaḥ (47)|
divy38:103: tasmādvilaṅghāmi vacastvadīyam yāsyāmi taṁ tvaṁ prajahīhi śokam |
divy38:104: tatraiva yāyāṁ nidhanaṁ samudre chinnaṁ mayā vā vyasanaṁ janasya (48)|
divy38:105: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātaramapramāṇīkṛtya nirgatya gṛhādvārāṇasyāṁ puryāmātmānaṁ sārthavāhamityuddhoṣayāmāsa |
divy38:106: asyāmeva purā puraṁdarapurīpratispardhipuryāṁ vaṇik mitro nāma babhūva yatsuranaraprakhyātakīrtidhvajaḥ |
divy38:107: putrastasya mahāsamudramacirādyāsyatyamuṣmindine yātum ye vaṇijaḥ kṛtopakaraṇāste santu sajjā iti (49)|
divy38:108: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo vividhopakaraṇasambhārasādhanānāṁ samāgṛhītapuṇyāhaprasthānabhadrāṇāmupahṛtamaṅgalavividhānāṁ vaṇijāṁ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ kṛtaparivāraḥ prasasāra |
divy38:109: mātā cainaṁ gacchatīti śrutvāha—mamaikaputraka, kva yāsyasīti karuṇakaruṇākranditamātraparāyāṇā komalavimalakamaladalavilāsālasābhyāṁ pāṇikamalābhyāṁ rucirakanakaghaṭitaghaṭavikaṭapayodharavarorubhāsuramuraḥ pragāḍhamabhitāḍayati |
divy38:110: bāṣpasaliladhārāparamparodbhavoparudhyamānakaṇṭhī anilabalākulitagalitasajalajaladapaṭalāvalīmalinakeśapāśā satvaratvaramabhigamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya pādayoḥ pariṣvajyaivamāha—mā māṁ putraka parityajaya yāsīti |
divy38:111: anartharāgagrahamūḍhabuddhayo narā hi paśyanti na kevalaṁ hitam |
divy38:112: satāṁ hitādhānavidhānacetasāṁ giro ’pi śṛṇvanti na bhūtavādinām (50)|
divy38:113: maitrakanyako ’pi dharaṇitalaniṁnāṁ mātaraṁ śokavaśyāṁ śirasi kupitacittaḥ pādavajreṇa hatvā |
divy38:114: muhurupacitaśokaḥ karmaṇā preryamāṇas tvaritamatirabhūt saṁprayātuṁ vaṇigbhiḥ (51)|
divy38:115: tataḥ sā mātā samutthāyāha—putraka,  mayi gamananivṛttiṁ kartumatyudyatāyām yadupacitamapuṇyaṁ macchirastāḍanātte |
divy38:116: vyasanaphalamanantaṁ mā tu bhūt karmaṇo ’sya punarapi guruvākyaṁ mātigāḥ svapnato ’pi (52)|
divy38:117: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo vividhavihārāyatanaparvatopavanagahvarasarittaḍāgārāmaramaṇīyatarānanekanagaranigamarkaṭagrāmādīnanuvicaran krameṇa samudratīraṁ saṁprāpya sajjīkṛtayānapātro bhujagapativadanavisṛtaśvasanacapalabalavilulitavipulavimalasalilamaruṇataruṇakiraṇanikararucirapadmarāgapuñjaprabhārāgarañjitormimālājalamasurasvarasamasuraparasureśvarakarodarasphuritahutavahaśikhāvalīkarālavajrapatanabhayanilīnadharaṇīdharaśikharaparāhatajaloddhatottuṅgataraṁgabhaṅgaraudraṁ samudramavatatāra |
divy38:130: tadeva sa saṁlakṣya tīraparyantarekhaṁ prakaṭavikaṭārtagartodarabhramadbhramitajhaṣabhujagakulamaṇḍalaṁ naikavicitrādbhutāścaryamatiśayamambhasāmālayamatikrāmatastasya dharaṇīdharaśikharavipulātmabhāvasya makarakaripatervivartamānasya samutthitairurvīdharākāradāruṇaiḥ pramuktakalakalārāvaraudrairmahadbhiḥ salilanivahairutpīḍyamānaṁ tadyānapātraṁ maraṇabhayaviṣādabhraśyamānagātrairdīnaruditākranditamātraparāyaṇaiḥ samyānapātrakaiḥ saha sahaiva salilanidheradhaḥ praveṣṭumārabdham |
divy38:137: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastena mahatā vyasanopanipātenāpyanāpatitabhayaviṣādadainyāyāsamanāḥ samavalambya mahaddhairyaparākramaṁ sasambhramaṁ phalakamādāya prasasāra |
divy38:138: tato ’sau samapavanagamanajavajanitasavilāsagatibhiḥ salilaplavairitastataḥ samākṣipyamāṇo nirāhāratayā ca parimlāyamānanayanavadanakamalaścānyairbahubhirahorātrairyathākathaṁcittasya durvagāhasalilasya mahārṇavasya dakṣiṇaṁ tīradeśamāsasāda |
divy38:140: saṁsmṛtya māturvacanaṁ sa pāṇā vyāsajya mūrdhānamidaṁ jagāda (62)|
divy38:141: śṛṇvanti ye nātmahitaṁ gurūṇāṁ vākyaṁ hitārthodayakāryabhadram |
divy38:144: prāptaṁ phalaṁ janmataroḥ sudhībhirye mānayantīha giro gurūṇām (64)|
divy38:145: māturhitāyaiva sadodyatāyāḥ prollaṅghya vākyaṁ mama duṣkṛtasya |
divy38:146: puṣpam yadīdṛgbharapāpadāruṇaṁ prāntaṁ gamiṣyāmi kadā phalasya (65)|
divy38:148: guruśirasi dadhānaḥ pādavajraṁ khalo ’haṁ kathamavanividāryaśvabhrarandhre na lagnaḥ (66)|
divy38:149: ye santo hitavādināṁ sphuṭadhiyāṁ saṁpādayante giriḥ śreyaste samavāpnuvanti niyataṁ kravyādapuryām yathā |
divy38:150: ye tūtsṛjya mahārthasāradayitāṁ vācaṁ śrayante ’nyathā dustāre vyasanodadhau nipatintāḥ śocanti te ’ham yathā (67)|
divy38:151: tato ’sau krameṇa khadiravarasaralaniculabakulatamālatālanālikeradrumavanagahanaṁ pravaravāraṇavarāhacamaraśarabhaśambaramahiṣaviṣāṇakarṣaṇapatitamathitavividhamālulatājāladuḥsaṁcaraṁ kvacitkṣubhitakesarininādabhayacakitavanacarakulākīrṇacaraṇaṁ kathaṁcidapi śabaramanujajanacaraṇākṣuṇṇaparyantamanucaran kvacit sthitvaivamāha— ete dāḍimapuṣpalohitamukhāḥ pronmuktakolāhalā hāsādarśitadantapaṅktivirasāḥ śākhāmṛgā nirbhayāḥ |
divy38:152: sarpān bhīmaviṣānalasphuradurujvālākarālasphuṭān hatvā pāṇitalaiḥ prayānti vivaśāḥ phūtkārabhītā nunaḥ (68)|
divy38:154: vaṁśaistālaravaiḥ sagītamadhuraiḥ pracchedasampādibhiḥ saṁgītāhitacatasaḥ pramuditā gāyantyamī kinnarāḥ (69)|
divy38:167: tathāparaṁ dadarśa— likhantaṁ karālair nabhaḥ śṛṅgajālaiḥ kṣipantaṁ mayūkhaistamaḥ sāgarāṇām |
divy38:175: dṛṣṭvaivamāha— ete parvataśṛṅgavandanatarucchāyāsthalaṁ saṁsṛtāḥ karṇaprāvaraṇaṁ navāruṇakaracchāyāsamānaśriyaḥ |
divy38:176: prekṣante madavārilolamadhuliṭprollīḍhagaṇḍasthalaṁ darpāt kesariṇo balena mahatā pronmathyamānā gajam (78)|
divy38:177: ityevamasāvatikāntāradurgaṁ salilaphalāhāramātraparāyaṇaḥ paribhrannajñānatamaḥpaṭalāvaguṇṭhitamiva jagat saṁsārapaṅke tribhuvanasvāmīvodayad ramaṇakaṁ nāma nagaraṁ dadarśa |
divy38:190: tasmānnagarādviniḥsṛtya catasro ’psaraso dravitanavakanakarasarāgāvadātamūrtayaḥ pravikasitāmbujakusumarucakarucinayanayugalotpalavilāsāḥ kvaṇadruciravividhamaṇimekhalāpabhā(prāgbhā)ramandavilāsagatayaḥ kanakakalaśākārapṛthutarapaodharabharāvanamitatanumadhyā divasakarakarasparśavibodhitāmlānakamalapalāśabhāsurādharakisalayā vividhavibhūṣaṇaśatā nirāmayadarśanāḥ śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayo maitrakanyasya bodhisattvasya pādayorvinyasitaśirasaḥ prāhuh— susvāgataṁ candrasamānanāya nārījanaprītivivardhanāya |
divy38:192: adyaiva duḥkhāni śamaṁ gatāni adyaiva no jīvitamāttasāram |
divy38:197: teṣāṁ phalaṁ vīkṣaṇameva te ’laṁ saṅgastvayā kiṁ punareva dīghyam (rgha?) (87)|
divy38:198: adyaiva mā bandhusuhṛdviyogaśokaṁkathāḥ kasya na santyapāyāḥ |
divy38:199: dāsyo vayaṁ te ’psarasaścatasrah chāyā na te laṅghayituṁ samarthāḥ (88)|
divy38:200: ratnāni vāsāṁsi samujjvalāni śayyāśrayāścārutarā vayaṁ ca |
divy38:205: nitye viyoge maraṇāt puraḥsthite śocanti te deśakṛte viyoge |
divy38:208: haimādriśṛṅgamiva tatpuramāviśantaṁ nemuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bahavo ’pi tatra (92)|
divy38:209: anyaiśca punah— kiṁ dīptaraśmirvinigūḍharaśmiḥ kiṁ puṣpaketuḥ sahasāvatīrṇaḥ |
divy38:210: hā kiṁ vinikṣipya kharāgravajro nāthaḥ surāṇāmiti tarkito ’bhūt (93)|
divy38:216: krīḍan sa kālaṁ na viveda yātaṁ sarvātmanā rāgaparītacetāḥ (96)|
divy38:217: pratyahaṁ ca dakṣiṇena gamanaṁ vārayanti sma |
divy38:218: so ’pi yathā yathā nivāryate, tathā tathā tayā diśā gamanāyautsukyamanā babhūva |
divy38:221: yadi kuryādayaṁ loke suhṛdāṁ vacanaṁ hitam |
divy38:222: paraiti svargaṁ pātāle śvabhre vā svapnato ’pi na (98)|
divy38:223: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāsāmapsarasāmaparijñātagamanaprayojano dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi padavīmāruhya vrajan sadāmattakaṁ nāma nagaraṁ dadarśa |
divy38:224: tasmādapi nagarādaṣṭāpsarasaḥ sasambhramaṁ niḥsṛtya taṁ mahāsattvaṁ praveśayāmāsuḥ |
divy38:225: tatrāpyaticiraṁ ratimanubhūya pratiṣiddhamānagamanakriyastenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchannandanaṁ nāma nagaraṁ dadarśa |
divy38:227: tatrāpi ciraṁ krīḍāṁ sevitvā tasmādapi brahmottaraṁ nāma nagaraṁ prayayau |
divy38:228: tatrāpi dvātriṁśatāpsarobhiḥ prabhūtasatkāraṁ viṣayasukhaṁ bhuktvā tāḥ prāha— icchāmi gantuṁ tadahaṁ bhavantyo mā matkṛte śokahrade śayīdhvam |
divy38:229: saṁpātabhadrāṇi hi kasya nāma viśleṣaduḥkhāni na santi loke (99)|
divy38:230: sthitvāpi yenaiva ciraṁ viyogaḥ śatroḥ kṛtāntādbhavitāntakāle |
divy38:233: viśleṣaduḥkhāya ratiṁ prayānti teṣāṁ paro nāsti vimūḍhacetāḥ (101)|
divy38:234: athāpsarasastāḥ samastāstadgamanaviyogaśokaropitahṛdayāḥ sasambhramāḥ kamalakuvalayakunmalavilāsā nalinya iva śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayaḥ prāhuh— asmāsu te kartumaniṣṭamiṣṭaṁ kathaṁ hi bhaktipraṇayārpitāsu |
divy38:236: gatvā tannagaratrayam yadapi he svāminnihāpyāgataḥ saṁprāptā viṣayopabhogamadhurāḥ saṁpattayaste ciram |
divy38:237: gantavyaṁ na punastvayā subahunā proktena kim yāsi cet saṁsmartāsi vipatsamudrapatito vākyaṁ hi no duḥkhitaḥ (103)|
divy38:239: kathaṁ teṣu nivāryerannivarteran kathaṁ nu vā (104)|
divy38:240: niyojanīyāḥ suhṛdo ’suhṛdbhir yasmin hite karmaṇi nityakālam |
divy38:241: nivāraṇaṁ tatra tu ye prakurvate te śatravo mitratayā bhavanti (105)|
divy38:242: divyaṁ prāpya sukhaṁ pure ramaṇake saṁcoditaḥ karmaṇā āyāto ’smi niṣevaṇāya paraṁ saukhyaṁ sadāmattakam |
divy38:243: saṁprāpto ’smi tataḥ svakarmakuśaleneṣṭaṁ puraṁ nandanaṁ tasmādāgatakasya yūyamadhunā pronmūlitā bhūmayaḥ (106)|
divy38:244: tasmādato me gamanaṁ bhavantyo mā vārayadhvaṁ na hi no ’styapāyaḥ |
divy38:247: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāsāmapsarasāṁ hitamapi vākyamahitamivāvajñayā tiraskṛtya tenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan dadarśa mahārgalapraghaṭitaprakaṭapuṭacaturdvāradāruṇaṁ sureśvareṇāpyabhedyottuṅgāyasaviśālaprākārapariveṣṭitamantarbhramaccakramaṇḍalālokapramuktadamadamāśabdagambhīrabhairavamāyasaṁ nagaram |
divy38:249: samprāptamātrasya tu tatkṣaṇena dvāraṁ ca pusphoṭa kapāṭabhāram |
